Loading packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```
Loading in data
```{r}
toolik_biochem <- read_csv(here::here("data", "2011_Kling_Akchem.csv"), na = c(".", "NA")) |>
  clean_names() 
```
Subset of data only from "Toolik Inlet" site
```{r}
inlet_biochem <- toolik_biochem[toolik_biochem$site=="Toolik Inlet",] |> dplyr::select(p_h, doc_u_m, tdn_u_m)
head(inlet_biochem)
```

Finding mean value of each column in 3 different ways!
```{r}
#for loop
for(i in 1:ncol(inlet_biochem)){
  col_mean <- mean(inlet_biochem[[i]], na.rm=TRUE)
  print(col_mean)
}

#apply
apply(inlet_biochem, MARGIN = 2, FUN = mean, na.rm=TRUE)

#across
inlet_mean <- inlet_biochem |>
  mutate(across(c(p_h, doc_u_m, tdn_u_m), mean, na.rm=TRUE)) #returns list of the same mean eek
inlet_mean[1,]
```
